name: Ouroboros (itch) (Jonas Tyroller)
description:
Sacrifice your limbs to solve the puzzle!
You leave one of your legs behind when you jump.
You leave one of your arms behind when you press a button.

Team:
Jonas Tyroller - Gameplay
Yannick Pawills - Sound

Dev Time:
8 hours on stream and 2 more hours to fix some bugs.

Topic (Ouroboros) Interpretation:
You play the same level over and over again, but it gets more difficult every time.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
Space - Jump
R - Reset

Check Out My YouTube Channel:
https://www.youtube.com/c/JonasTyroller

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/JonasTyroller

Thanks for playing. :)
